title: GlenAllachie Limited Editions Tasting at Club Mareva Beirut

content.raw:
On March 13, 2025, Club Mareva Beirut welcomed a group of whisky enthusiasts for an exclusive GlenAllachie Limited Editions Whisky Tasting. With an intimate gathering of 15 guests, this event was a deep dive into some of the finest expressions from the renowned Speyside distillery.

Exploring Three Limited Edition Masterpieces

Guided by expert insights, attendees explored three exceptional GlenAllachie releases, each showcasing the brandâ€™s innovative approach to cask maturation:

ðŸ¥ƒ GlenAllachie 17 Year Old Mizunara Limited Edition â€“ A unique whisky finished in rare Mizunara oak, adding layers of exotic spice, sandalwood, and rich dark fruits.

ðŸ¥ƒ GlenAllachie 10 Year Old Cask Strength Batch 12 Limited Edition â€“ Bottled at 59.7% ABV, this powerful dram delivered an intense sherry influence with deep notes of cocoa, dried fruits, and spice.

ðŸ¥ƒ GlenAllachie 10 Year Old Ruby Port Finish Limited Edition â€“ A beautifully balanced expression, aged in Ruby Port casks, offering bursts of red berries, dark chocolate, and warm spice.

Pairings & Perfect Moments

To elevate the tasting experience, guests indulged in a curated selection of cheese and cold cuts, meticulously chosen to complement the rich profiles of the whiskies. The perfect pairing allowed attendees to explore the intricate balance of sweet, smoky, and savory notes, creating a truly multi-sensory experience.

A Night to Remember â€“ And Two Lucky Winners!

The evening was more than just a whisky tastingâ€”it was an immersive journey into the art of whisky-making, sparking engaging discussions and shared appreciation for fine spirits.

Adding an extra touch of excitement, two lucky guests walked away with a bottle of GlenAllachie 10 Year Old Ruby Port Finish after winning in a draw! A fitting end to a night filled with exceptional whisky and great company.

A Special Thanks to Jean Paul Abdallah

We would like to express our sincere gratitude to Jean Paul Abdallah for his invaluable support and contributions to making this event a success. His dedication to the whisky community and passion for premium spirits played a key role in bringing this exceptional experience to life.

More Unforgettable Experiences to Come

At Club Mareva Beirut, we are committed to curating exclusive whisky and cigar experiences that bring together connoisseurs in a warm and refined atmosphere. Stay tuned for more exciting masterclasses, tastings, and special events as we continue to explore the worldâ€™s finest spirits.

Cheers to another unforgettable night at Club Mareva Beirut! ðŸ¥ƒ
